Container.Name: AstroNvim
Container.Overview:
AstroNvim is an aesthetic and feature-rich neovim config that is extensible and easy to use with a great set of plugins
Run the following from the terminal before starting the container here, to allow it to set up all the configurations properly.
docker run -it --rm -v /mnt/user/appdata/astronvim:/root ghcr.io/lanjelin/astronvim-docker:latest
When everything stops moving, type :q and press Enter to leave the container. It is now safe to start it from the UI
Defaults to expose only nvim to the webui. To make is expose shell (zsh), change the Post Arguments to 'ttyd zsh'
